pageProduct.name: Thompsons Salmon Oil Plus 1000mg 300 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Salmon Oil Plus is low reflux formula to help support cardiovascular health and brain function.

Thompson's Salmon Oil Plus helps support cardiovascular health, brain function and general wellbeing. It is a low reflux formula that combines natural Fish Oil from salmon (70%), with natural Fish Oil from anchovies and sardines (30%) to provide a high EPA/DHA content. It is a rich source of Omega-3 fatty acids, the essential fatty acids required by the body to help support inflammatory response. Thompson's Salmon Oil Plus is a high quality product that does not use artificially concentrated Fish Oil and only contains sustainably sourced fish. The Fish Oil in Salmon Oil Plus is regularly tested for mercury, lead and PCBs.

Size: 300 Capsules

Gender: Both

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support cardiovascular health, brain function and general wellbeing
• Low reflux formula
• Rich source of Omega-3 fatty acids
• High quality product that does not use artificially concentrated Fish Oil
• Only contains sustainably sourced fish
• Regularly tested for mercury, lead and PCBs

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Use only as directed and always read the label.
Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains:
Fish Oil-Natural 1g (1000mg)
equiv. Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA) 180mg
equiv. Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) 120mg
Natural orange oil.

Contains: Sulphites.

Allergen Contains: Sulphites

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
